content: corner pull 3 pull loose ends through the loop ensuring ends 3rd double_crochet even lengths through 4 repeat between every 3rd double_crochet stitch to width of the cowl for both sections page 2 5 trim fringe ends as required block stitch button cowl - pattern - us crochet terms dreammakesbyjd this pattern cannot be copied shared or sold without the author s permission all photographs diagrams and written contents of this document are the property of the author finished products made from this pattern fringe can be sold with acknowledgment to the pattern author as below block stitch button cowl 2024 etsy dreammakesbyjd instagram jeeti_makes © jatinder dhammu 2024 copyright act 1968 cth australia page 3
